name: @flashist/fconsole
description: Bunch* of useful debug tools for speeding up development process of Pixi.js based applications. Written in TypeScript. Inspired by Flash-Console.

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && cd ./dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && cd ./dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run build && cd ./dist && npm publish

author: Mark Dolbyrev
